translations.user.lang.setNone: Now I'll speak the Guild's Default Language!
translations.gui.title: $(dynamic.botname) - GUI
translations.answers.exception: an exception occurred while running this command:
translations.user.lang.set: Now I'll speak in %s to you!
translations.user.name: Name
translations.error.contentmanager: The ContentManager failed at loading the content. Please report it to the devs.
translations.gui.stats1: %d msgs; %d cmds; %d crashes; %d spam; %d noperms; %d invalidargs.
translations.guild.lang.set: Now I'll speak %s in this Guild!
translations.answers.invalidArgs: you've sent invalid arguments to the command.
translations.inviteme.link: Click the Link to invite the Bot to your Guild

toofast.info: Only the Bot Owner can use it. Enabled by default

translations.startup: Hello! I'm now Online and ready to receive commands!
translations.help:
Hello! I'm $(dynamic.botname).
To get started with the Commands, send: $(dynamic.mention) cmds
To invite me to your Guild, send: $(dynamic.mention) bot inviteme
translations.hello1: Hello! I'm $(dynamic.botname). Someone dropped me here!
translations.hello2:
Someone call %s to set my Default Language!
(Because of the Region, I guessed the language as `%s`, but the Guild Owner can set it anytime by executing `$(dynamic.mention) guild lang <en_US|pt_BR|etc>`)

guild.perms.set.info:
Define the permissions of a user specified by the parameter.
It doesn't allow, however, lower-ranks changing higher-ranks permissions.

guild.perms.get.info:
If executed without arguments, return the sender's permissions.
If a user is specified, the user's permissions is returned instead.

funny.skyrim.lydia.info:
Quotes pumped from http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Lydia.
 Specify a number to generate multiple.

funny.stevenuniverse.theorygenerator.info: Based on http://www.generatorland.com/usergenerator.aspx?id=10737 data. Specify a number to generate multiple.
